ValidationRule.description: Location and Transportation - LEED for Neighborhood Development Location - Point Check
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( LEED_USR_Mod_LT_1__c = 0 || LEED_USR_Mod_LT_1__c = 8 || LEED_USR_Mod_LT_1__c = 10 || LEED_USR_Mod_LT_1__c = 12 || LEED_USR_Mod_LT_1__c = 16 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This field's value is outside of the acceptable range. Please adjust to a value of 0, 8, 10, 12, or 16.
